export_tconx_query_template: select SYST_CD_SRC, TNGY_CD_SRC, TBLD_CD_SRC, SYST_CD, SCHM_CD, DTBS_CD, DTBS_LEVEL_0, DTBS_LEVEL_1, DTBS_LEVEL_2, TNGY_CD, TABL_CD_LAKE, TABL_CD_LAKE_CL, TABL_CD_LAKEOUT, COLS_CD_LAKEOUT, COLS_BUS_KEY, TABL_CD_PART_BY, COLS_PART_COLUMN, COLS_CD_TIMEZONE, COLS_CD_DATETIME_FRMT, COLS_CD_LAKE, COLS_POS_SRC, COLS_DATATYPE, COLS_LENGTH, COLS_SCALE, DELI_CD, ALGO_CD, HEADER_LINES_NO, DTBS_CD_SRC, SCHM_CD_SRC, CLLD_CD_SRC from M3D_API.V_API_M3D_MDP where syst_cd='{}' and dtbs_cd='{}' and schm_cd='{}' and tabl_cd_lake='{}' order by cols_pos_src
export_all_tconx_query_template: select SYST_CD_SRC, TNGY_CD_SRC, TBLD_CD_SRC, SYST_CD, SCHM_CD, DTBS_CD, DTBS_LEVEL_0, DTBS_LEVEL_1, DTBS_LEVEL_2, TNGY_CD, TABL_CD_LAKE, TABL_CD_LAKE_CL, TABL_CD_LAKEOUT, COLS_CD_LAKEOUT, COLS_BUS_KEY, TABL_CD_PART_BY, COLS_PART_COLUMN, COLS_CD_TIMEZONE, COLS_CD_DATETIME_FRMT, COLS_CD_LAKE, COLS_POS_SRC, COLS_DATATYPE, COLS_LENGTH, COLS_SCALE, DELI_CD, ALGO_CD, HEADER_LINES_NO, DTBS_CD_SRC, SCHM_CD_SRC, CLLD_CD_SRC from M3D_API.V_API_M3D_MDP where syst_cd='{}' and dtbs_cd='{}' and schm_cd='{}' order by cols_pos_src
